title: [Medicine] NIH Scientists Identify Nutrient that Helps Prevent Bacterial Infection. Taurine, which Helps the Body Digest Fats and Oils, Could Offer Treatment Benefit.

[Epidemiology] China study (n = 123,535 children) finds evidence that the prevalence of myopia increased 1.4 to 3 times in 2020 compared with the previous 5 years. Researchers postulate that increased screen time and less time outdoors is a possible cause.
